required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Single Radiolabeled Dose Study to Investigate the Absorption, Metabolism and Excretion of [14C]-ETC-1002
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-Label,Single Radiolabeled Dose Study to Investigate the Absorption, Metabolism and Excretion of [14C]-ETC-1002 in Healthy Male Volunteers

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration
United Kingdom:Radiologic Authorization Submission to Administration of Radioactive Substances Advisory Committee (ARSAC)

brief_summary.textblock: This Phase 1 study will assess the mass balance recover of carbon-14 (14C) labelled ETC-1002 and the routes and rates of excretion of [14C]-ETC-1002

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Bio-equivalence Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Diagnostic

primary_outcome.measure: Level of [14C]-ETC-1002 in urine and feces after a single dose

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy Male Volunteers
- BMI 10-35 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Hx of CV, renal, hepatic, chronic respiratory or GI disease
- Hx of drug or alcohol abuse
- smoking within 12 mos of screening

overall_official.last_name: Stuart Mair, MBChB, DRCOG, DCPSA, MFPM
overall_official.affiliation: Quotient Clinical, Mere Way, Ruddington Fields, Ruddington, Nottinham NG11 6JS, UK
